name: Slush'E'Mart - Job Simulator
description:
In a world where robots have replaced all human jobs, step into the Slush E Mart Store Clerk - Job Sim to learn what it was like 'to JOB'.

Players can relive the glory days of work by simulating the ins-outs of being a convenience store clerk!
● Throw a can of beans around the shop!
● Use your hands to stack, manipulate, throw, and smash physics objects in an inexplicably satisfying way!
● *NEW!* Work the never-ending shift!
